message: The legislation, sponsored by Sen. Orrin Hatch, R-Utah, would be composed of eight to 14 representatives from nongovernmental organizations and nonprofit groups that have experience in anti-human trafficking efforts and care for victims.

data.description: The U.S. Senate passed a bill sponsored by Sen. Orrin Hatch on Tuesday to create a human trafficking advisory council.
data.title: Senate passes Hatch bill to create human trafficking advisory council
